name: Cunard L-shaped Sofa
description: Named after the great shipping line, whose heyday was in the Art Deco era, this majestic L-shaped sofa with a 3-seater sofa and incorporated left-facing chaise with long arm is part of a full range of sectional sofas and chairs, all of which would add grandeur to any home. With the classic Deco curved arm rests and back framed in hand carved wood and a sumptuously deep seat, this is a piece created for supreme comfort and style.
